mapper.sql: select id, carrier_id, carrier_code, order_number, release_no, bill_of_lading, business_unit, consignee, container_number, expired_dem, empty_container_depot, det_free_time, secure_code, release_date, vessel, vessel_no , voy_no, sztp, status, release_status, create_source, remark, del_flg, create_by, file_create_time, create_time, update_by, update_time, transaction_id, pol, pod, house_bill_id, consignee_by_tax_code, tax_code from edo
mapper.select: select distinct e.id, e.carrier_id, e.carrier_code, e.order_number, e.release_no, e.bill_of_lading, e.business_unit, e.consignee, e.container_number, e.expired_dem, e.empty_container_depot, e.det_free_time, e.secure_code, e.release_date, e.vessel, e.vessel_no , e.voy_no, e.sztp, e.release_status, e.create_source, e.remark, e.del_flg, e.create_by, e.file_create_time, e.create_time, e.update_by, e.update_time, e.transaction_id, e.pol, e.pod, e.house_bill_id, e.consignee_by_tax_code, e.tax_code , s.status as status from edo e left join shipment_detail s on e.bill_of_lading = s.bl_no and e.container_number = s.container_no where e.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
select seq_edo.nextval as id from DUAL
insert into edo
id, carrier_id, carrier_code, order_number, release_no, bill_of_lading, business_unit, consignee, container_number, expired_dem, empty_container_depot, det_free_time, secure_code, release_date, vessel, vessel_no, voy_no, sztp, status, release_status, create_source, transaction_id, remark, del_flg, create_by, file_create_time, pol, pod, consignee_by_tax_code, tax_code, create_time
#{id}, #{carrierId}, #{carrierCode}, #{orderNumber}, #{releaseNo}, #{billOfLading}, #{businessUnit}, #{consignee}, UPPER(#{containerNumber}), #{expiredDem}, #{emptyContainerDepot}, #{detFreeTime}, #{secureCode}, #{releaseDate}, #{vessel}, #{vesselNo}, #{voyNo}, #{sztp}, #{status}, #{releaseStatus}, #{createSource}, #{transactionId}, #{remark}, #{delFlg}, #{createBy}, #{fileCreateTime}, #{pol}, #{pod}, #{consigneeByTaxCode}, #{taxCode}, sysdate
mapper.update:
update edo
consignee = #{consignee}, container_number = #{containerNumber}, expired_dem = #{expiredDem}, empty_container_depot = #{emptyContainerDepot},
det_free_time = #{detFreeTime}, secure_code = #{secureCode}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, vessel = #{vessel}, vessel_no = #{vesselNo}, voy_no = #{voyNo}, sztp = #{sztp}, status = #{status}, release_status = #{releaseStatus}, create_source = #{createSource}, transaction_id = #{transactionId}, remark = #{remark}, del_flg = #{delFlg}, update_by = #{updateBy}, house_bill_id = #{houseBillId}, update_time = sysdate
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from edo where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: where container_number = #{container} and bill_of_lading = #{billNo}
select carrier_code from edo where bill_of_lading = #{blNo} and house_bill_id is null group by carrier_code
select count(*) from edo where bill_of_lading = #{blNo} group by bill_of_lading
where bill_of_lading = #{blNo} and house_bill_id is null

select distinct voy_no from edo
and carrier_code in
#{carrier_code}
and carrier_code = #{carrierCode} and vessel like concat(concat('%', #{vessel}), '%') and voy_no like concat(concat('%', #{voyNo}), '%')

select distinct carrier_code from edo
and carrier_code like concat(concat('%', #{carrierCode}), '%')

select distinct vessel_no from edo
and carrier_code in
#{carrier_code}
and vessel_no like concat(concat('%', #{VesselNo}), '%')
mapper.update:
update edo
consignee = #{consignee}, container_number = #{containerNumber}, expired_dem = #{expiredDem}, empty_container_depot = #{emptyContainerDepot},
det_free_time = #{detFreeTime}, secure_code = #{secureCode}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, vessel = #{vessel}, vessel_no = #{vesselNo}, voy_no = #{voyNo}, sztp = #{sztp}, status = #{status}, release_status = #{releaseStatus}, create_source = #{createSource}, transaction_id = #{transactionId}, remark = #{remark}, del_flg = #{delFlg}, update_by = #{updateBy}, consignee_by_tax_code = #{consigneeByTaxCode}, tax_code = #{taxCode}, update_time = sysdate
where bill_of_lading = #{billOfLading} and container_number = #{containerNumber}
mapper.select: select count(*) from edo where bill_of_lading = #{blNo} and order_number = #{orderNumber} and house_bill_id is null
